title: Begone dull care
creator_contributor_role: National Film Board of Canada, production company
abstract: Norman McLaren visually represents jazz music in a series of abstract lines and shapes, hand painted directly on to the film.
description: A lively interpretation of jazz music played by the Oscar Peterson Trio. The music is visually represented in a series of abstract lines and shapes, hand painted directly on to the film, culminating in a fast and furious explosion as the tempo quickens. One of the high points of jazz in cinema (and of McLaren's career).
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: VoD Program; B2003186; Captivating rhythm in Jazz; Active
